title: Serve Robotics to acquire hospital logistics provider Diligent Robotics
description:
Serve Robotics said it hopes to help Diligent Robotics scale deployments of its hospital delivery robot Moxi.

The post Serve Robotics to acquire hospital logistics provider Diligent Robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
